mapper.select: select count(case when origin_station = #{destination_station} and is_board = 0 then 1 end) as riding_pass, count(case when origin_station = #{destination_station} and is_board = 0 and is_help = 1 then 1 end) riding_pass_help, count(case when destination_station = #{destination_station} and is_board = 1 then 1 end) as landing_pass, count(case when destination_station = #{destination_station} and is_board = 1 and is_help = 1 then 1 end) as landing_pass_help from boarding_passengers where bus_route_id = #{bus_route_id} and veh_id = #{veh_id};
